cards.flavor: The apex of Kellythross’ creations, it took the artificer weeks to finish it, but the result made all the effort worth the while.
cards.name: Mechanical Masterpiece
cards.originalText: Indestructible (Damage and effects that say “destroy” don't destroy this creature.)
cards.text: Indestructible (Damage and effects that say “destroy” don't destroy this creature.)

cards.name: Merkurio, Volatile Elementalist
cards.originalText:
[+1]: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.
[-4]: Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Merkurio deals 2 damage to any target.
[-8]: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may cast any number of instant and sorcery cards from among them without paying their mana costs.
cards.text:
[+1]: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.
[-4]: Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Merkurio deals 2 damage to any target.
[-8]: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may cast any number of instant and sorcery cards from among them without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Merkurio’s Command
cards.originalText:
Choose two—
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {6}.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.
• Creatures you don't control get -3/-0 until end of turn.
• Exile up to two target creatures, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

• Draw two cards, then discard a card.
• Creatures you don't control get -3/-0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Merkurio’s Opus
cards.originalText:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Prowess
When Merkurio's Opus enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.name: Merthilios’ Escort
cards.originalText:
Encourage 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may encourage target creature with less power than this by putting a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Merthilios' Escort encourages a creature, that creature gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: After an artificer spontaneously had the idea, many Demmuryans began replacing parts of their bodies with metal parts.
cards.name: Metalwork Machinist
cards.originalText: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Metalwork Machinist.
cards.text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Metalwork Machinist.

cards.flavor: “Organic life can always be improved upon.”
cards.name: Meticulous Dissector
cards.originalText:
Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.text:
Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.name: Mindbreak Artisan
cards.originalText:
When Mindbreak Artisan enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, shuffle your library, then put that card on top.
Other artifacts you control have “You may choose not to untap this artifact during your untap step” and “{3}{U}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control this artifact and it remains tapped.”
cards.text:

cards.name: Miraculous Genesis
cards.originalText: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. Then each player may choose a noncreature permanent. Destroy those permanents.
cards.text: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. Then each player may choose a noncreature permanent. Destroy those permanents.

cards.name: Mobilize the Heavenly
cards.originalText:
Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
Whenever a creature you control with flying deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.
cards.text:

cards.name: Mold Shambler
cards.originalText:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.

cards.flavor: A Pyromancer’s rage must be released in small doses, or it can be devastating for anyone who’s at the wrong place at the wrong time.
cards.name: Molten Ritual
cards.originalText: Molten Ritual deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
cards.text: Molten Ritual deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor:
“Sometimes I fear we’re nothing more than pawns in a game that’s bigger than all of us.”
—Jeska, Neolition Leader
cards.name: Moment of Madness
cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.text: Gain control of target creature with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Those creatures that tread the Eternal Fronds are filled with vigor with every step they take.
cards.name: Mossvine Lurker
cards.originalText: Mossvine Lurker has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.text: Mossvine Lurker has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Mountain Victor
cards.originalText:
Kicker {2}{R} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Mountain Victor enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if it was kicked.

Mulch Harvest
cards.originalText: Exile a nonland card from your graveyard: For each colored mana symbol in that card's mana cost, add one mana of that color. Activate this ability only once each turn. (For example, if the card's mana cost is 3{G}{G}{W}, you add {G}{G}{W}.)
